seo: XMall,SQL注入漏洞,数据泄露,电商购物商城
seo_en: XMall,SQL Injection Vulnerability,Data Leakage,E-commerce Shopping Mall
summary: 检测Exrick XMall开源商城后台管理系统中多处接口的SQL注入漏洞，防止可能引发的数据泄露问题。
summary_en: Detect SQL injection vulnerabilities in multiple interfaces of the Exrick XMall open-source mall background management system to prevent potential data leakage issues.
